title: Pineapple and courgette loaf
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '400g caster sugar', '250ml vegetable oil', '3 eggs', '3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g grated courgette', '1/2 (432g) tin crushed pineapple, well drained', '145g raisins', '115g chopped walnuts']
